title: Church Dresses for Women 3/4 Sleeve Bodycon Ruffle Vintage Wear to Work Pencil Midi Dress
description: Material：95% polyester and 5 %spandex.The sexy church dresses is soft touching,stretchy,very comfortable.

Design:Ruffle on the right cover the line of body to look slimmer. The design of the 3/4 sleeve allows you to apply in all seasons. The pleated part on the waist will sag a little if the upper body is thin.
Size:Our size is different from amazon's.Please kindly refer to the size chart showed in the image or just leave your Q&A on this page.
